functions.title: Teaching Assistant
functions.description:
Teaching Assistant for the following courses:

BSc:
- Computer Graphics (current)
- Operating Systems (current)
- Advanced Object-Oriented Programming (4x; Coordinator)
- Object-Oriented Programming (4x; Coordinator)
- Advanced Algorithms and Data Structures (2x; head TA)
- Algorithms and Data Structures in C for AI (2x)
- Signals and Systems (2x)
- Parallel Computing

MSc:
- Advanced Computer Graphics
- Image Processing (x2)

functions.title: Numerus Fixus Coordinator CS
functions.description: Coordinator of the Numerus Fixus procedure for Computing Science. Also involved in streamlining the Numerus Fixus process on a faculty level.

functions.title: Full Stack Web Developer MATIG
functions.description:
Designed, built, and maintained MATIG: a system that simplifies the organisation and improves the efficiency of the matching procedure for several studies at the Faculty of Science and Engineering.
MATIG was built using MongoDB, Express, React, NodeJS, Redis, and Kubernetes.

functions.title: Themis Developer
functions.description: Responsible for adding a plagiarism scanning and reporting feature to the online grading system Themis.

functions.title: Teaching Assistant Matching Class
functions.description: Designed and coordinated the matching process for Computing Science. The matching process helps prospective students determine whether they are making the right choice and gives them an indication of their suitability for the study based on a number of matching tests. After this year, the study switched to a Numerus Fixus procedure.

functions.title: Student Mentor
functions.description: Responsible for mentoring a group of first year Computing Science Bachelor students to provide guidance w.r.t. studying and university life.

education.degree: MSc Computing Science, Data Science and Systems Complexity
notes: Best paper presentation award for the Student Colloquium course.
Best 2 minute madness presentation award for the Student Colloquium course.
Best presentation award for the Information Systems course.
1st place Presentation Contest for the Introduction to Data Science course.
activities: Student member interview committee Tenure Track Assistant Professor (x2)
Student member interview committee Teachers for Computing Science Programme.
